problems_validated.severity: Major - described as 'one of the biggest issues in react land'
problems_validated.current_solutions: Traditional data fetching methods that 'always caused issues'
problems_validated.market_gap: TanStack Query solved this so well that React docs recommend using their package

actionable_quotes.quote: I find sometimes a Chrome extension is a great MVP minimal viable product and then you can always take your Chrome extension and then go build a SaaS business out of that
actionable_quotes.context: Discussing business strategy for Chrome extensions
actionable_quotes.actionability: Use Chrome extensions as stepping stone to larger SaaS business

actionable_quotes.quote: The Chrome Store is a huge opportunity in so many ways and I don't think there's enough Founders kind of experimenting in that zone
actionable_quotes.actionability: Consider Chrome Store as underexplored market for entrepreneurs

comment_insights.insight: People are actively building Chrome extensions using AI tools and seeing success
comment_insights.evidence: I started building chrome extensions last week using Perplexity and having some success
comment_insights.author: @soulpower_institute
comment_insights.relevance: Shows market validation and that the approach works in practice

comment_insights.insight: Developers are successfully creating extensions and getting them approved
comment_insights.evidence: I built #7 'Tube Genie Pro'. Your video popped up while I was waiting for Chrome store approval
comment_insights.author: @RudyBanks
comment_insights.relevance: Demonstrates real implementation and market entry process

comment_insights.insight: There's demand for content about the publishing and monetization process

comment_insights.author: @abundance219
comment_insights.relevance: Identifies content gap and business process need
